name: I ride a Scooter
description:
You are hired by a local grocery store in a newly developed seaside town to do deliveries,
run errands and take on various roles on a fully functional motorized Scooter.
You will be asked to complete jobs as simple as gathering fruits up a tree to bring back to the store, or climbing a mountain to interact with an animal, to simply throwing magazines at the doorstep of local stores/residents. No two jobs are the same. Expect to ride through traffic, climb the mountain range, enter buildings, interact with animals, hop on/off the Scooter via teleport and more all while listening to the radio. This is just the beginning of your new life in VR.

OVERVIEW:
. Total control of Scooter : Accelerate at your speed, steer freely, hop on/off bike via teleport
. Music player to enjoy while you work around town on your Scooter
. You can enter some buildings, you can climb certain parts of the mountain
. Interaction with the animal kingdom in a living seaside town
. Relaxing setting when combining riding, picking your music and interacting in a living town
. Be watchful for angry cab drivers and falling from height, as both will get you killed
. VR sickness kept to minimum : gas/turn as slowly as you want, reduced FOV when riding

FUTURE PLANS:
. Player having to put gas into bike at gas station
. More parts of the mountain region will be accessible/climbable
. More buildings to enter
. Another city or a forest island nearby for the new missions
. More animals and/or people interaction
. Lots more to come
